import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{Card,Row,Col}from'react-bootstrap';import{useHistory}from'react-router-dom';import{listUsers}from'../../../../actions/userActions';import{listOrders}from'../../../../actions/orderAction';import'./StatCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StatCards=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();let history=useHistory();const[userCount,setUserCount]=useState(0);const[orderCount,setOrderCount]=useState(0);const userList=useSelector(state=>state.userList);const{users}=userList;const userLogin=useSelector(state=>state.userLogin);const{userInfo}=userLogin;const orderList=useSelector(state=>state.orderList);const{orders}=orderList;useEffect(()=>{if(userInfo&&userInfo.isAdmin){dispatch(listUsers());dispatch(listOrders());const userLen=users.length;const orderLen=orders.length;setUserCount(userLen);setOrderCount(orderLen);}else{history.push('/login');}// eslint-disable-next-line react-hooks/exhaustive-deps
},[dispatch,userInfo,history]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"card-set-deck",border:"primary",style:{width:'16rem'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Body,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas card-icon fa-users"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"card-text-name",children:"All Users"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"card-count",children:userCount})})})]})]})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"card-set-deck",border:"primary",style:{width:'16rem'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Body,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-sort-amount-down-alt"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"card-text-name",children:"All Orders"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"card-count",children:orderCount})})})]})]})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"card-set-deck",border:"primary",style:{width:'16rem'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Body,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-truck"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"card-text-name",children:"Delivered"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"card-count",children:orderCount})})})]})]})})})]});};export default StatCards;

sourcesContent: import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Card, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { listUsers } from '../../../../actions/userActions' import { listOrders } from '../../../../actions/orderAction' import './StatCard.css' const StatCards = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() let history = useHistory() const [userCount, setUserCount] = useState(0) const [orderCount, setOrderCount] = useState(0) const userList = useSelector(state => state.userList) const { users } = userList const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const { userInfo } = userLogin const orderList = useSelector(state => state.orderList) const { orders } = orderList useEffect(() => { if (userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin) { dispatch(listUsers()) dispatch(listOrders()) const userLen = users.length; const orderLen = orders.length; setUserCount(userLen) setOrderCount(orderLen) } else { history.push('/login') } // eslint-disable-next-line react-hooks/exhaustive-deps }, [dispatch, userInfo, history]) return ( All Users {userCount} All Orders {orderCount} Delivered {orderCount} ) } export default StatCards
